meanings.definition: Not chaste; not virtuous or pure in a sexual sense.
meanings.sent1: She was known as the unchastest woman in town.
meanings.sent2: The unchastest behavior is frowned upon in our community.
meanings.sent3: The unchastest gossip spread like wildfire through the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: His unchastest thoughts led him down a dangerous path.
meanings.sent5: The unchastest scenes in the movie made some viewers uncomfortable.

meanings.definition: Not chaste; lacking moral purity or restraint.
meanings.sent1: The unchastest actions of the politician shocked the public.
meanings.sent2: Living an unchastest life can have negative consequences.
meanings.sent3: The unchastest excuses for being late were creative but unbelievable.
meanings.sent4: Her unchastest behavior at the party raised a few eyebrows.
meanings.sent5: The unchastest choices he made haunted him for years to come.
